summary: A cop goes undercover in a ruthless underworld organization to stop a gang leader, only to put himself in great danger after being exposed by his former protégé and best friend.
cast: Donnie Yen|Tian Jing|Andy On|Ronald Cheng|Collin Chou|Terence Yin|Zhigang Yang|Hanyu Zhang|Hee Ching Paw|Cheung-Ching Mak|Pok Fu Chow|Tony Ho|Wai-Kai Law|Ken Lo|Frankie Chi-Hung Ng|Wai-Nam So|Chris Tsui|Kam Tong Wong|Hua Yan|Kang Yu
title: Te shu shen fen
